english.segment1: Must have been that winter cold. That made me set out on my own. I said my goodbyes and left You behind. Growing up is getting old
english.segment2: Bring back the memories. bring back that smile because I've outgrown them. Now I remember but everything's changed. Still I'm captivated by that face You wear tonight
english.segment3: Must have been the April thaw. That made me hunger for Your arms. You welcomed me back and you held me close. Overnights don't seem so cold
english.segment4: Bring back the memories. Bring back that smile because I've outgrown them. Now I remember but everything's changed. Still I'm captivated by that face You wear tonight. Familiar but it looks so new in streetlight - in this light
